text:
The YouTube publishing automation (Ultimate Video Uploader v30-2) handles metadata creation, thumbnail processing, conditional branching, and automated upload.

Capabilities include:
- Trigger-driven automation for uploading YouTube content.
- Formatter steps for titles, descriptions, tags, and categories.
- Conditional branches for short-form (<2 min) vs long-form video.
- Automated thumbnail ingestion and WordPress publishing.
- Multi-step YouTube API interaction for scheduling and upload.
- Final verification steps, status logging, and automated notifications on success or failure.

This system consolidates the work of multiple staff roles into a single-button publishing workflow.
